channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: a235d3ee-5935-4cfb-8cc5-a3303ad5995e
Display name: Storage File Data SMB MI Admin
Description: Allows for admin-level access for managed identities on files/directories in Azure file shares.
Link: https://management.azure.com/a235d3ee-5935-4cfb-8cc5-a3303ad5995e?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: a4b156ac-253f-4a1a-9851-96d62b71b047
Display name: SRE Agent Reader
Description: View all SRE Agent resources, but does not allow you to make any changes.
Link: https://management.azure.com/a4b156ac-253f-4a1a-9851-96d62b71b047?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: f24a559b-c2fc-4409-b96e-9af4b0c28ad6
Display name: Edge Order Partner Inventory Manager Service Role
Description: Manage inventory metadata and inventory links associated with Edge Order Partner scenarios. Enables configuration and control of inventory resources for tracking and fulfillment purposes
Link: https://management.azure.com/f24a559b-c2fc-4409-b96e-9af4b0c28ad6?api-version=2022-04-01
